pluginstrument.author: Thijmen de Gooijer
pluginstrument.description:
The CGR-30P is an electronic engine monitor by Electronics International Inc. All rights, and trademarks related to the instrument belong solely to Electronics International Inc.
This Air Manager instrument is an unofficial version with much more limited functionality than the real instrument. The primary limitation is that neither FS X, nor Prepar3D, nor X-Plane provide temperature data on individual engine cylinders.
